title: Stock Futures Point to First Weekly Gains Since March
sub_head: All three major U.S. indexes are up 3.4% or more for the week, based on Thursdayâ€™s close
body:
U.S. stock futures rose, putting major indexes on track to extend a recent stretch of gains and snap a punishing losing streak.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.3% Friday, while those for the Dow Jones Industrial Average ticked up 0.1%. Contracts for the technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 gained 0.5%. On Thursday, stocks climbed, pushing the Dow to its fifth consecutive daily gain.
